item.title: Minecraft Server and Plugin Development
item.description: In this blog post I talk about my experience learning to create Minecraft Servers and Plugins. Backstory As a kid I played a lot of video games. I mainly played Minecraft on popular online servers like Mineplex and Hypixel. During these days, I would wake up, hop on a call with my friends, and we would just play games. As I got older, these servers started to fade away and things changed.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me at: tannerelephant@gmail.com
